com.elvenrings.qdemo.model

Class SingleChoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elvenrings.qdemo.model.SingleChoice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Choice

    public class SingleChoice
extends Object
implements Choice
    A class representing the options available for a question for which only one option is correct.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Iliasu Salifu, iliasu@elvenrings.com

        public SingleChoice()
        Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • getOptionList

        public List<String> getOptionList()
        Returns a List of Strings representing the options for a question.
        Specified by:
        getOptionList in interface Choice
        Returns:
        An empty String List with each string representing the text for a single option

      • getOptionMap

        public Map<Integer,String> getOptionMap()
        Returns a map containing all the available options.
        Returns:
        A map of all options and their positions. The position will be used for ordering the options when they are displayed.

      • addOption

        public void addOption(Integer position,
                      String text)
        Adds a new option to the option list. If another option is present at the specified location it overwrites it.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the option in the option list.
        text - The textual string of the option.

      • setCorrectChoice

        public void setCorrectChoice(Integer correctPosition)
                      throws InvalidChoiceException
        Sets the position of the option that is the correct answer.
        Parameters:
        correctPosition - The position of the correct answer.
        Throws:
        InvalidChoiceException - Raised if the specified position is invalid.

      • getCorrectChoice

        public int getCorrectChoice()
                     throws InvalidChoiceException
        Returns the position of the correct answer.
        Returns:
        The position of the correct answer.
        Throws:
        InvalidChoiceException - Raised if the correct position is currently unset

      • toString

        public String toString()
        String representation of this class. A '*' is appended as the last character of the correct option text.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of this class (Single Choice options).
